drinkName.name: Van Leer Rose
drinkName.about: This bourbon-based cocktail is on the menu at Louisville, Kentuckyâ€™s watering hole The Monkey Wrench.

ingredients.ingredient: Grenadine (Wilks and Wilson, or any traditional grenadine with a touch of rose water)

mix.how: Add all ingredients to a shaker and fill with ice.
Shake vigorously, and strain into a cocktail glass, express lemon over top,.
For a lighter version, serve the drink over fresh ice with a slice of lemon.
